title: Understanding the Purpose of Hiding Worksheets
text: Hiding worksheets can be useful for various reasons. Consider why you might want to keep certain data out of view.

title: Sensitive Data
text: Think about the types of data that might need to be hidden from view. What kind of information would you not want everyone to see?

hintAnswer: hide rows, columns and worksheets that contain sensitive data
title: Choosing the Correct Option
text: Select the option that best describes why you might hide worksheets.
choices: hide rows, columns and worksheets that contain sensitive data
hide worksheets that contain sensitive data
hide data you are not using
